clinical_study.brief_title: European Study to Evaluate Preliminary Safety and Efficacy of Multiple Obalon Gastric Balloons for 12 Weeks as an Aid for Weight Loss
clinical_study.official_title: Feasibility Study to Evaluate Preliminary Safety and Efficacy of Multiple Obalon Gastric Balloons for 12 Weeks as an Aid for Weight Loss

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to evaluate the initial safety and preliminary effectiveness of the Obalon intragastric balloon system in European subjects with a BMI in the range of 27 - 35 kg/m^2

primary_outcome.measure: Percent Excess Weight Loss based on an ideal BMI of 25.

arm_group.description: Patients received 1-3 Obalon Gastric Balloons over a period of 12 weeks

study_pop.textblock: Patients were selected from investigators' patient population and included patients with a BMI in the range of 27 - 35 kg/m^2
